item.title: Security Challenge Game
item.description:
Welcome to the Security Challenge!

Think you have what it takes to spot security vulnerabilities? This interactive game will test your knowledge of common security issues in code.

How to Play

  1. Read the code snippet carefully
  2. Identify potential security vulnerabilities
  3. Select all applicable security issues
  4. Submit your answer and learn from the explanation
  5. Try to get a perfect score!

This game features real-world scenarios and common security pitfalls that every security-conscious developer should be aware of. Each challenge is based on actual vulnerabilities found in production code.
